text: can I trigger Documenter to build again all documentations for tagged versions of a package?

elements.text: can I trigger Documenter to build again all documentations for tagged versions of a package?

text: You'd have to re-trigger the CI for each of the tags

elements.text: You'd have to re-trigger the CI for each of the tags

text: Or, for the versions where Documenter is new enough, you could push new tags for each tagged version, with something like +doc1 appended

elements.text: Or, for the versions where Documenter is new enough, you could push new tags for each tagged version, with something like +doc1 appended

text: <https://github.com/JuliaDocs/Documenter.jl/pull/1298|https://github.com/JuliaDocs/Documenter.jl/pull/1298> for the latter, but you need Documenter 0.25.0 or newer

elements.text: for the latter, but you need Documenter 0.25.0 or newer
